tok: nimi sina pi toki pona li tan seme?
jan seme pi kulupu mama sina li sona toki pona?
jan seme pi sitelen tawa li pona tawa sina?
kili seme li pona tawa sina?
sina wile kama sona e toki ante seme tan seme?
musi seme li pona tawa sina?
seli en lete la seme li pona nanpa wan tawa sina?
soweli lili mute en soweli suli wan la sina wile utala e seme?
sina wile sitelen lon lipu kepeken luka anu lon ilo nanpa anu seme?
soweli nasa li lon ala lon tomo sina? sina wile ala wile ni?
sina ken tawa lon tenpo la, sina wile tawa lon tenpo seme? sina pali e seme?
sina wile toki pona e lipu seme e musi seme?
seme li kama lon poka sina li nasa nanpa wan?
tomo sona la nasin sona seme li pona tawa sina? ni li tan seme?
sewi li pana e ijo la ijo seme li pona nanpa wan tawa sina?
mani li suli ala la, sina wile pali seme?
sina kama sona e toki pona tan seme?
soweli seme li suwi tawa sina li jaki tawa jan ante mute?
tenpo poka la sina seme?
sina sona ala sona e jan poka pi toki pona?
jan mute li sona ala e kalama musi seme pi pona mute?
tomo sina la seme li lon?
jan pona sina nanpa wan li pona seme?
ma sina la sina lukin e seme?
moku seme li pona nanpa wan tawa sina?
sina lon ala tomo la sina seme?
sina lukin e lipu seme lon tenpo poka?
sina lukin e sitelen tawa seme lon tenpo poka?
seme li pona wawa e pilin sina a?
tenpo poka la, sina toki e seme lon toki pona?
sina ken tawa ma ale la, sina tawa seme?
sina jo e jan pi ken ale la, sina wile e seme tu wan?
nasin tawa seme li pona tawa sina?
sina wile ala wile awen lon ma ante? wile la, ma seme? tan seme?
sina ken kon lon tenpo suno wan la sina tawa seme? sina lukin e seme?
sina ken soweli la, sina wile soweli seme?
sina wile ala wile lon tenpo pini? wile la, tenpo seme?
seme li nasin nasa pi kulupu mama sina?
sina ken toki tawa jan wan. ona li ken lon li ken moli. ni la, sina toki tawa jan seme?
en: Where does your Toki Pona name come from?
Who else in your family knows Toki Pona?
What movie/show characters do you like?
What's a fruit or vegetable you like?
What other languages would you like to learn and why?
What amusing things do you like?
Do you prefer heat or cold?
Would you rather fight many small animals or one large animal?
Do you prefer writing on paper by hand, with a computer, or some other way?
Do you have any unusual pets? Would you like to?
If you could time travel, where would you go? What would you do?
What would you like to translate into/adapt for Toki Pona?
What's the strangest event that happened close to you?
What is/was your favorite subject in school? Why?
What is your favorite weather?
If money wasnâ€™t important, what job would you like to do?
Why did you start learning Toki Pona?
What animal do you find cute that others find ugly?
What have you done recently?
Do you know anyone else who speaks toki pona in real life?
What's a great song that most people don't know about?
How would you describe your home?
What is your favorite person like?
What does the land you come from look like?
What is your favorite meal?
If you're outside, what do you like to do?
Could you describe the last story or article you read?
What was the last movie or show you watched like?
What makes your day instantly better?
What do you use to travel?
What's the last thing you talked about in toki pona?
If you had a genie, which 3 wishes are you picking?
What's your favorite method of transportation?
Do you want to live somewhere else? If so, where? Why?
If you could be a ghost for a day, where would you go and what would you observe?
If you could become an animal, what would you be?
If you could live in a historical period, would you want to? If so, which one?
What's a strange tradition or inside joke your family has?
If you could have a conversation with any person, living or dead, who would you choose?
